Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms.vmplacementgroup

Class VmPlacementGroup

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.CustomerEntityAbstract
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms.VmSimple
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms.VmGroup
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms.vmplacementgroup.VmPlacementGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms.Vm>, org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.AbstractMachine<org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources.Resource>, org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.ChangeableId, org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.CustomerEntity, org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.Delayable, org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.Identifiable, org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.ResourceStatsComputer<org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms.VmResourceStats>, org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.UniquelyIdentifiable, org.cloudbus.cloudsim.datacenters.TimeZoned, org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources.Resourceful, org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms.Vm
public class VmPlacementGroup extends org.cloudbus.cloudsim.vms.VmGroup
A VmPlacementGroup is a group of VMs that is requested to be placed according to a set of rules/constrains that take into account the topology of the system. These rules are characterized by: 
 (1) the VmPlacementGroupScope of the group
 (2) the VmPlacementGroupAffinityType of the group
 (3) the VmPlacementGroupEnforcement of the rules
Since:
CloudSim Plus 7.3.2
Author:
Pavlos Maniotis
See Also:
  • VmPlacementGroupScope
  • VmPlacementGroupAffinityType
  • VmPlacementGroupEnforcement
  • VmAllocationPolicyBestFitWithPlacementGroups_LRRL
  • VmAllocationPolicyChicSchedAllPack
